documents.document: The world is a crazy place right now. No matter what you believe; who you vote for - we can and should all get along. Love one another! ✌🏻
@TAwkwardBrit1 hahahaha this trumps my story all day long
Anyone else text themselves to remember something & then wake up freaking out bc someone w the same name texted "don't forget the cheese"
@ccarpentermusic @VICTORIADALSTON I'm down for this if you don't have support yet! X
There's mice in my house. I caught one with a trap but now I don't know what to do because I'm too scared it will come alive if I touch it
@thebrianfallon happy Birthday man! Stoked for the new record. 🎉
@TheRyanAdams sounded dope tonight. Thank you! Streets of Philadelphia was 👌🏻.
Important Announcement: I saw Ryan Adams this evening and it was incredible.
@phoebe_bridgers Smoke Signals is currently my bedtime soundtrack. The backwards singing reminds me of The Japanese House! Are you a fan? X
@LoopyHayz @Samshabir_ very nice of you. Thank you so much! X
@TonyMen44217772 @jessicapruneau @TwoWaysHome @fifthfloor nice one Tony. Thanks very much. I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Heading to London listening to Ryan Adam's 'Doomsday'. Amazing. Today is odd. Its amazing how much music can change ones attitude.
@taylercarriere how do you think I feel? I'm the one who's got to look in the mirror
@d_styles89 THANK 👏🏻 YOU 👏🏻
@dxlly182 you may have tattooed my lyrics on your arm but you're not too good to get a good telling off! stop this madness.
@mrnatural_live thank you! Nice of you!
Music all sounds the same today and it really frustrates me ://
@thebrianfallon mate I seriously can't get enough of your solo record. Absolutely killer. Can't wait for the next one!
@Jim_Fallan hey that's my lyrics! :)
Writing a song in the airport toilet. Don't quite understand why everyone keeps knocking on the door. I'm doing art in here.
I'm playing a co-headline show with the one & only Kaity Rae at The Slaughtered Lamb in London on 9th Feb. Tickets: https://t.co/GPlnKx4c3I
@d_styles89 it's just the back lolz, I stopped her before she got too far.
U kno the thing when you tell the hairdresser you don't want your head shaved and she starts shaving and you cry
@phoebe_bridgers I stumbled across your record this evening and it is 🔥🔥🔥
@d_styles89 you're REALLY gonna get to know me in this record. I hate to keep talking about it but I'm soo anxious too.
@conorcoughlan_ that @ makes my tweet look so much less sincere
LITERALLY just wrote THEE SADDEST song I've ever written@
@TAwkwardBrit1 these are exactly my thoughts! Especially new artists, how can you get to know them with 4 songs?
Curious... do you guys prefer albums? Or EP's? I personally prefer albums but lots of people don't have the attention for it. Thoughts?
How's everyone enjoying 2017 so far? I hope you're all having a good start!
@d_styles89 @theblaze don't they just!!
I love NYE because the creativity always comes along. For the last 3 years I've wrote a song. Let's see what this year brings.
@TheRyanAdams @Channel4 probably the most interesting songwriting technique I've heard of. Might give it a try myself!
@theblaze this makes me so angry. His comment was harmless and actually... a compliment!
@thebrianfallon I always thought this was my metaphor :(
So excited to be returning to the UK next week!!
@dxlly182 ❤️ u and thank you
@dxlly182 that's a little bit awesome!!!
@d_styles89 so glad you like it! And regarding my voice... thank you for the compliment but 'twas v rusty x
@neverlandricky ahh what did you think???
@SeliG26 shit! I knew it was one side of Christmas. Thought it was before. Guess I'll have to wish you again on the 26th!
@SeliG26 Hey Mrs. Happy Birthday to you! Thanks for your continued support. Have a great one x
@d_styles89 @dxlly182 :( I missed you both! Yes you can rewatch it!
@Red_and_Blue26 thanks for tuning in mate.
@Oreilly1Peter thank you very much Peter. All the best to you! Merry Christmas.
Going live on Facebook in 5 minutes! https://t.co/ja5FGUDWTM
Doing a Facebook live in approximately 2 hours. (9pm GMT). Gonna be playing some songs, new and old and chatting to anyone who wants to! :)
I CANNOT EXPRESS MY EXCITEMENT TO SHARE MY SECOND ALBUM WITH YA'LL.
Might do a Facebook Christmas Live next week. Play some new songs maybe. Who's game?
@SeliG26 I'm so excited too. You don't understand.
@Red_and_Blue26 just a passing thought throughout my day. Nothing more, nothing less
Hope I grow up to be a dilf
@d_styles89 haha, how thoughtful. It sums up my life that's for sure.
This! Support musicians if you can. Buy the music. https://t.co/bl3BIgjffG
I love seeing young (non musician) people getting turned on to great artists from the 60's & 70's. There is hope for music after all.
36 years ago today we lost John Lennon. Still blows my mind to think about his death. Thank you for the great music, John ✌🏼️
@d_styles89 I've bought a lot of old albums lately but the new one I bought was Ryan Adams new album Prisoner! X
I'm already pre-ordering albums for 2017 and realised it's almost that time. '2017' it just looks weird.
@KaityRaeMusic HAHA! Mate I'm working on it.
Asking the big guy for peace, love and peanut butter for Christmas this year. You?
@mattjwillis @JamesBourne #bustedxmasforeveryone2016
@mattjwillis @JamesBourne Not to put ideas in your head or anything but you should do the cheesy Xmas show u did years ago. I'd watch! Ha.
@ptri_amnda I would love to!
@aloneinatlantis thank you! I'm in love w you x
@isabelebear thank you!
@SeliG26 I haven't/I'm not going anywhere!
@doggocth very kind of you. Thank you Matilda! X
Sharing @mercuryroomyeg stage with Post Script and Okay Mann. What a beautiful buzz! 👌🏻 https://t.co/oM9LWVi8wR

Until next time, Edmonton! 🙏🏻
📷 Trevor Belsher https://t.co/Fp2BbB4lQn
@doddleoddle in my Uber in Canada and the drivers only got one of your bloody tunes on! Congrats x
@EdmontonTourism @mercuryroomyeg doors are at 8! I'm on at about 9
Off to soundcheck at @mercuryroomyeg for tonight's show in Edmonton. Wish me luck! ✌🏻️ https://t.co/C1g7WGCU2p
@postscriptsound looking forward to seeing your guys set tomorrow! Dig the record.
@TAwkwardBrit1 thank you!
@unofficialdavis ahh thanks mate! Glad you like it.
@d_styles89 you're a gem. Thank you for sticking by me x
@d_styles89 THAT PUN THO
@d_styles89 isn't that what caps locks, italics and exclamation marks are for?
I've 👏🏻 never 👏🏻 clapped 👏🏻 after 👏🏻 every 👏🏻 single 👏🏻 word 👏🏻 I 👏🏻 say 👏🏻 and 👏🏻 I 👏🏻don't 👏🏻understand 👏🏻why 👏🏻people 👏🏻 do 👏🏻 this👏🏻
@cozy_luke we'll make that dream a reality one day x
Looking forward to this weekends show in Edmonton! Tickets are still available!
@KristenPickner you're not allowed to do that
This was 1 year ago today! Enjoy. x https://t.co/XB81tx97Db
I've developed a recent obsession with magic. Maybe for encores now I'll learn a trick to do instead of a song. Good idea?
@levvis_ new tune reminds me of early Coldplay! Nice one man. Looking forward to the album.
Also, can't wait till I can stop talking about it and just let you guys hear it!
Working hard on this batch of songs for album 2. I'm driving myself to insanity but I want to make them the best they can be for you (& me).
@neverlandricky it flew @ me!!!
@dxlly182 it was a pigeon and it flew at me! He was in the wrong!!!
@Matt_Belmont @TootingTram haha, of course man. Wouldn't have it any other way!
How bloody excited am I to hear @JohnMayer 's new single this Thursday?!? Too bloody excited!
This break has been long enough. I'm so ready to get back to making music now.
@Rachaell5SOS @SeliG26 ahhh, so much love for you both. Thank you both for your support! 💕
@SeliG26 this is so sweet, thank you! 💕 I hope someday that'll happen.
@foweygirl thank you!
@djwebbles @KUSF thanks a lot man! I appreciate the spin. Hope all is well.
@d_styles89 she is amazing tho!
Happy Birthday @Neilyoung Thank you for all of the inspiration you have given me and many others over the years.
Can we just talk about how good Norah Jones is???
Wow, what a year so far. Another one gone. Leonard Cohen, RIP.
